Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, 

After a bit of time coming here whithout never leave a single thanks for your help, I decided it was about time to get my \*\*\* here^^'!

So first of all thanks to all of you that did help me going through all those hours of fun with Kerbal!! (around a little 431h ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)).

Thanks to all the modders that did incredible stuff so far making this game even more awsome!! (for some of them should even call their work of piece of art!)

And, of course, thanks to the SQUAD team (all of you guys!!) for making this crasily-insanely-....ty-geniusly piece of a game!!!!!!!!!!!!! (and just in case: YES this is a compliment!! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

So yeah I'm MI53RE (read misÃƒÂ¨re), completely Insane (which is , from what I heard, a good thing in order to pilot kerbals's spacecrafts ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) ) and definitely keep being around for the best... and the worst!!!!![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Thanks for your attention and have fun!!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome! It makes me glad to know you're enjoy KSP and the community very much! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

431 hours in KSP? Nice! Signing up for the forums is a great decision; I have yet to regret it!

Completely insane is a good description of the games at times ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif). Welcome to the forums! We have some insane stuff here too. Mostly awesome, with a bit of insanity mixed in.
Glad to have you aboard MI53RE!
